attributes.action: make the csa stop putting non resident parent familes on the breadline
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: taking 40% of our income to repay arrears on top of mantaince leaving second familes in poverty and taking ten years to find someboby even though having national insurance number

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
